title: Cervical cancer
creator_credit: Russell Kightley, A Ralph Rosenthal and Health Education Video Unit, Leicestershire Health Authority
brief_description: Details the structure of the cervix and explains why it is particularly vulnerable to external agents. Addresses the high incidence of cervical cancer and recommends preventative strategies.
